thread.title: The South Rim of the Grand Canyon at Sunset
thread.title_full: The South Rim of the Grand Canyon at Sunset

author: Gary
title: The South Rim of the Grand Canyon at Sunset
text:
The South Rim of the Grand Canyon at Sunset 
Camera NIKON D200 Aperture f/4.8 Exposure Time 1/200 sec 
The Grand Canyon is one of the most awe inspiring things in the world, yet sadly few American, even people who live in Arizona, never bother to make the trip to see it. I went most of my life without seeing it until 2009 when I finally took a trip to Arizona by car. It was well worth the time. 
Since then I returned to the Grand Canyon and I hope to be going back again at some time in the future. It is so big, and there is so much to see, you could probably make an entire career out of just photographing the Canyon. Get My FREE 100 Page Travel Photography eBook!
